children.name: case 3
keywords: Ci = Cj\{x} ∪ Ck\{¬ x}  ei = ej ∨ ek
Assume: v⟦ei⟧ = 0 — so v⟦ej⟧ = 0 and v⟦ek⟧ = 0; v⟦Ci|x,+z⟧ = 0 — so v⟦Cj|x,+z \ {x}⟧ = 0 and v⟦Ck|x,+z \ {¬ x}⟧ = 0.
Then: if v⟦x⟧ = 0 then v⟦Cj|x,+z⟧ = 0, so v⟦F⟧ = 0 by induction; if v⟦x⟧ = 1 then v⟦Ck|x,+z⟧ = 0, so v⟦F⟧ = 0 by induction.
Assume: v⟦Ci|y,z⟧ = 0 — so v⟦Cj|y,z⟧ = 0 and v⟦Ck|y,z⟧ = 0; v⟦ei⟧ = 1 — so either v⟦ej⟧ = 1, which gives v⟦G⟧ = 0 by induction; or v⟦ek⟧ = 1, which gives v⟦G⟧ = 0 by induction.

children.name: case 4
keywords: Ci = Cj\{y} ∪ Ck\{¬y}  ei = ej ∧ ek
v⟦Cj|x,+z⟧ = 0 and v⟦Ck|y,+z⟧ = 0; v⟦ej⟧ = 0 or v⟦ek⟧ = 0; so v⟦F⟧ = 0 by induction.
v⟦Cj|y,z\ {y}⟧ = 0 and v⟦Ck|y,z\ {¬ y}⟧ = 0; v⟦ej⟧ = 1 and v⟦ek⟧ = 1; so v⟦G⟧ = 0 by induction.

children.name: case 5
keywords: Ci = Cj\{z} ∪ Ck\{¬z}  ei = (ej ∨ z) ∧ ek
Assume: v⟦Ci|x,+z⟧ = 0 — so v⟦Cj|x,+z \ {z}⟧ = 0 and v⟦Ck|x,+z⟧ = 0. v⟦ei⟧ = 0 — so (v⟦ej⟧ = 0 and v⟦z⟧ = 0) or v⟦ek⟧ = 0;
Then: v⟦Cj|x,+z⟧ = 0, so v⟦F⟧ = 0 by induction.
Assume: v⟦Ci|y,z⟧ = 0 — so v⟦Cj|y,z \ {z}⟧ = 0 and v⟦Ck|y,z \ {¬ z}⟧ = 0. v⟦ei⟧ = 1 — so (v⟦ej⟧ = 1 or v⟦z⟧ = 1) and v⟦ek⟧ = 1 .
Then: either v⟦z⟧ = 0, so v⟦Cj|y,z⟧ = 0, v⟦G⟧ = 1; or v⟦z⟧ = 1 ...
